items.sentence: We don't have enough time to do everything that needs to be done.
My curtains were open, so I could see what was happening outside.
Tom can't believe Mary thinks it's OK to let John take the blame.
Why didn't you tell me that you couldn't do that without my help?
Why didn't you tell me that you were planning to go to Australia?
To make this cake, you'll need baking powder and unsalted butter.
Are you really listening, or just waiting for your turn to speak?
Tom and Mary blamed each other for the failure of their marriage.
I'm going to do my homework as soon as I get home this afternoon.
One of the babies started crying and all of the others joined in.
